app.title: Supplementary Materials
app.p: The following are available online at https://www.mdpi.com/1660-4601/16/6/1043/s1, Table S1: Means of grain yield plant −1 and grain yield components of rice cultivars grown at low (26/23 °C) or high temperature (27/30 °C) and subjected to different drought treatments. Table S2: Means of quality characteristics: amylose content (AmC), gel consistency (GC), gelatinisation temperature (GT), total protein content (Prot), total phenolic content (TPC), and total antioxidant capacity (TAC) of rice cultivars grown at low (26/23 °C) or high temperature (27/30 °C) and subjected to different drought treatments.
